abstract: National Athletic Trainers’ Assn calls for more rigorous standards to treat sports-related spine injuries; protocol was last revised in 1998.
lead_paragraph: The National Athletic Trainers’ Association is calling for more rigorous standards to treat sports-related spine injuries.

headline.main: New Spinal Protocol Sought by Trainers’ Association

snippet: The National Athletic Trainers’ Association is calling for more rigorous standards to treat sports-related spine injuries.
